LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Disliked.stages.0.de: Feels relief in maintaining traditional gender norms.
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Disliked.stages.1.de: Uncomfortable with a transgender individual being in the colony, feels it detracts from traditional gender norms.
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Disliked.stages.2.de: Unsettled by the presence of multiple transgender individuals.
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Disliked.stages.3.de: Distraught over the amount of transgender individuals, nervous and stressed.
LanguageData.NegativeViewOnTransgender.stages.0.label: Is transgender
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.0.label: Lacking transgender individuals
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.0.descr: Our community isn't diverse until we get transgender individuals.
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.1.label: First transgender individual
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.1.descr: The presence of a transgender individual among us speaks volume about our diversity.
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.2.label: Multiple transgender individuals
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.2.descr: Multiple transgender people within the community make us feel safe and diverse.
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.3.label: Populated transgender community
LanguageData.AmountOfTransgender_Liked.stages.3.descr: Joyful for the abundance of transgender individuals, symbolizing full acceptance.
LanguageData.PositiveViewOnTransgender.stages.0.label: Is transgender
LanguageData.Cisphobia.stages.0.label: Is cisgender
LanguageData.Transphobia.stages.0.label: Is transgender
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.0.label: Intimate with a trans person
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.0.description: Been around a trans person recently, feeling great!
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.1.label: Need a trans person
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.1.description: I haven't felt the touch of a trans person in a while..
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.2.label: Longing for a trans person
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.2.description: I'm getting anxious and worried that I will never touch a trans person ever again.
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.3.label: Aching for a trans person
LanguageData.Chaser_Need_Thought.stages.3.description: I am foaming at the mouth in desperate need for a transgender.
LanguageData.Similarity.stages.0.label: Relates to being transgender
LanguageData.Transgender_Person_Joined.stages.0.label: Transgender person joined
LanguageData.Transgender_Person_Joined.stages.0.descr: It feels good knowing that I can relate to being transgender with {0}.
LanguageData.Transgender_Person_Joined.stages.1.label: Transgender person joined
LanguageData.Transgender_Person_Joined.stages.1.descr: Disgusting! Why did we let {0} join?
LanguageData.Cisgender_Person_Joined.stages.0.label: Cisgender person joined
LanguageData.Cisgender_Person_Joined.stages.0.descrip: Disgusting! Why did we let {0} join?
LanguageData.Accidental_Misgender.stages.0.label: Misgendered someone
LanguageData.Accidental_Misgender.stages.0.descriptio: I accidentally misgendered {0}. I feel terrible.
LanguageData.Misgendered.stages.0.label: Misgendered me
LanguageData.MisgenderedMood.stages.0.label: Misgendered
LanguageData.Internal_Transphobia.stages.0.label: Internal transphobia
LanguageData.Internal_Transphobia.stages.0.descriptio: I feel ashamed for being transgender
LanguageData.Internal_Transphobia.stages.1.label: Mild internal transphobia
LanguageData.Internal_Transphobia.stages.1.descriptio: It hurts that our culture is unaccepting of people like me
